{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=MBR1516 |revision= |fcc_date=09/11/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H202 |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, LTE router |fcc_id=PY312200204, N7NMC7700, |ic_id=4054A-12200204, 2417C-MC7700, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4717A1 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4717A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7700 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=MDM9200 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=LTE |wi2_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=LTE |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Mobile LTE Broadband Wireless Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=MBR1516}} {{â€¢}} [http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GDC/MBR1516/UserManual_English_French.pdf Manual]
:Per the FCC photos.. (OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H202) ;[[Sierra Wireless]] ''AirPrime'' MC7700 - LTE Mini PCIe (USB) Card *[[Qualcomm]] MDM9200/RTR8600/PM8028 + ''TriQuint'' TQM7M5013 *2x ''Rayspan'' antennas + 2x SMA connectors ("fg400-023-211RevB" :/ "fg400-023-211 RevB" is silkscreened on the antennas). *2x [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=943 SE2528L] (2528L) 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC :for the [[BCM]] WiSoC, internal WiFi antennas.
''NETGEAR'''s manual shows a sample SSID of '''Bell67A0''' :('''BellXXXX''' SSID pattern) with a C0:3F:0E OUI.
